pageContext.claim: “We have hundreds of thousands of people here and I just want them to be recognized by the fake news media....It's just a great honor to have this kind of crowd and to be before you and hundreds of thousands of American patriots who are committed to the honesty of our elections and the integrity of our glorious republic....This, I think, is our all-time record. I think you have 250,000 people, 250,000.”
pageContext.analysis: The crowd at Trump's rally on The Ellipse was estimated at about 8,000 people.
